neu.ccs.cs5200.mbps.ldb.jdbc

Class LDBConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • neu.ccs.cs5200.mbps.ldb.jdbc.LDBConnector

  • public class LDBConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    Connects to the MBPS Library Database using JDBC. The scope of each database connection should be the method that the query occurs in.

        bookID - - the book ID to add

      • removeSelectedFromWishList

        public void removeSelectedFromWishList(int membershipId,
                              java.lang.String ISBN)
        Parameters:
        membershipId - - membershipId from session variable
        ISBN - - ISBN value from the wishlist This method removes the books in a members wish list The ISBN is used to remove the corresponding wish list for a member

      • viewDues

        public java.util.List<Rental> viewDues(int membershipId)
        viewDues method
        Parameters:
        membershipId - -- the membership id should come from the session object or variable This method views the dues of a membership give the membership ID. It displays the Book id, due for that book, ISBN and title The query contains the join of the Rental and Book table total dues is a variable used to derive the total dues payable by the member

      • acceptSelectedMembershipRequests

        public void acceptSelectedMembershipRequests(int requestId)
        This method is used to create membership records by servicing requests in the request table. This method is called when the check boxes are selected on "Respond to Requests" screen. and "Accept Selected" is created
        Parameters:
        requestId - - This represents the request id of the request which is obtained from "Respond to Requests" screen

      • deleteRequest

        public void deleteRequest(int requestId)
        This method is used to delete membership requests in the request table. This method is called when the check boxes are selected on "Respond to Requests" screen and "Reject Selected" button is clicked.
        Parameters:
        requestId - - the request to delete

        phoneNumber -

      • deleteMembership

        public void deleteMembership(Member member)
        This method creates an entry in the request table to delete membership. It calls the createRequest method with "delete" request type.
        Parameters:
        member - - the member request a deletion

      • viewRequests

      • hasCreateMembershipRequest

        public boolean hasCreateMembershipRequest(java.lang.String email)
        Determine if the given user has already submitted a create membership request.
        Parameters:
        email - - the email of the current user
        Returns:
        true iff a "create" request record exists for this year

      • viewCurrentCheckedOutBooks

        public java.util.List<Rental> viewCurrentCheckedOutBooks(Member member)
        This method displays the books checked out by a member
        Parameters:
        member - - the member for whom to find checked out books
        Returns:
        the list of books currently checked out by this member

      • addBook

        public void addBook(Book book)
        Allows a librarian to add a Book. This method automatically calculates "numCopies" field of the book being added, and updates all other books' "numCopies" that share its ISBN
        Parameters:
        book - - the book to add

      • updateBook

        public void updateBook(Book book)
        Updates the book record with the given bookID.
        Parameters:
        book - - the book to update

      • deleteBook

        public void deleteBook(int bookID)
        Delete the book with the given bookID. Also updates the numCopies of all other books that share its ISBN to be one less than their current value
        Parameters:
        bookID - - the id of the book to be deleted

      • createRentals

        public QueryResult createRentals(java.lang.String memberEmail,
                        java.util.List<Rental> rentals)
        Create Rental entries assigned to the given Member.
        Parameters:
        memberEmail -
        rentals -
        Returns:
        an indication whether the query ran successfully or not (include message if unsuccessful)

      • removeRental

        public void removeRental(int memberID,
                int bookID)
        Remove the rentals for the given member and book pairings.
        Parameters:
        memberID - - the member renting the book
        bookID - - the book rented by the member
